title: How to watch The Flash online: stream every new season 7 episode from anywhere
author: aatif-sulleyman
summary: The lightning fast Barry Allen is speeding onto our screens
article: It's not often that we're left waiting for The Flash, but after months of delays caused by Covid-19, the seventh season of the Arrowverse superhero series is here and a good number of episodes deep - and not a moment too soon for the popular CW show and its fans. Read for how to watch The Flash season 7 online and stream every new episode wherever you are today.
*Warning: major spoilers for The Flash exist below*

Season 7 kicked off with the planned finale for season 6, which had to wrap up early because of you-know-what. It also meant heartbreak for fans of the show, as one of its most popular characters, Nash Wells (Tom Cavanagh), sacrificed himself in order for Barry (Grant Gustin) to regain his powers.

Despite Nash's death, the season 7 premiere also managed to be one of the funniest episodes in the history of the series, as Gustin showed-off his comedic chops in one of his best acting performances to date.

What next for Barry and Central City? With his battery recharged, does he now stand a chance in his battle against all-powerful villain Eva McCulloch, aka Mirror Master? We're finding out as the latest season unravels.
Follow our guide below for how to watch The Flash online and stream all-new season 7 episodes wherever you are in the world right now - you can even watch The Flash free online in the US.
For those abroad while The Flash season 7 airs, you’ll be unable to watch the show like you normally would due to annoying regional restrictions. Luckily, there’s an easy solution.

Downloading a VPN will allow you to stream the the new series online no matter where you are. It's a simple bit of software that changes your IP address, meaning that you can access on-demand content or live TV just as if you were at home.
